Description: Register 1954: Glass bead, rather rough, blue-green in colour.
Curator's comments: Register 1954: "Collected by Evans-Pritchard in Egyptian desert, 1939".
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Dr Edward Evan Evans-Pritchard
Acquisition notes: Af1954,11.1 to 22 is a study collection of beads transferred from the Department of Oriental Antiquities in 1954. The collection was formed and given by Professor C G Seligman. The register records his extensive notes on their provenance and type.
